Posts.Content: Had Breast C in 2003, in 2006 metastatic brain cancer diagnosis. Had alarge tumor pearsized removed from back left side of brain (Balance vision and hearing,also Shortterm memory is there! my b-day7-11-06. following recovery and staple removal ..I had to have 33 some whole head radiations(EWE HATED THEM) still recovering fom them!!! Get the Tomotherapy now!!!These cancers grow fast,mine was size of a large pear,it almost killed me!!! Goodluck,Love,support,hope u are ok..I am also on an antiseizuredrug from side effects from Radiation..Tomotherapy asap!!!! Is this with a Gammaknife?? Susan E.B. --Message edited by CancerCompass staff. For personal protection, email address removed. Consider private reply. Please review CancerCompass Member Guidelines at http://www.cancercompass.com/common/guidelines.html--
Posts.Title: Treatment for metastatic breast cancer, now in the brain
